DOC.brief_summary: Non-invasive monitoring measure change blood volume .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Zynex Blood Volume Monitor Healthy Adult Patients During Blood Draw
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Between 1835 year age Weight 130200 pound Known cardiac disease Recent caffeine intake Tobacco use ( 4 ) hour prior screen Infection Pregnancy Hemoglobin < 13.5 g/dl
